#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y <<  endl
#define N 1000004

using namespace std;

int a[N];

int main(){

	int n;
	while(cin>>n){
		
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			scanf("%d", &a[i]);
		
		sort(a, a + n);
		
		long long ans = n, ct = 1; 
		ans = ans * (ans - 1)/2;
		
		for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){
			
			if(a[i] == a[i - 1])ct++;
			else{
				
				ans -= ct * (ct - 1)/2;
				ct = 1;
			}
			
		}
		
		ans -= ct * (ct - 1)/2;
		cout << ans << endl;
		
	}

}
